mapper.sql: mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_subscription, mem_company_name, mem_delYN, SUBSTR(mem_join_date,0, 10) as mem_join_date, SUBSTR(mem_mod_date,0, 10) as mem_mod_date, mem_login_fail
mapper.select: select e.enrd_id as enrd_id, e.mem_id as mem_id, m.mem_phone as mem_phone, m.mem_name as mem_name, m.mem_email as mem_email, m.mem_company_name as mem_company_name, s.slb_name as slb_name, e.enrd_stat as enrd_stat, enrd_join_date as enrd_join_date from enrollment_detail E LEFT JOIN member M ON e.mem_id = m.mem_id LEFT JOIN course C ON e.crs_id = c.crs_id LEFT JOIN syllabus S ON c.slb_id = s.slb_id

select e.enrd_id as enrd_id, e.mem_id as mem_id, m.mem_phone as mem_phone, m.mem_name as mem_name, substr(enrd_complete_date,1,10) as enrd_complete_date, m.mem_email as mem_email, m.mem_company_name as mem_company_name, s.slb_name as slb_name, e.enrd_stat as enrd_stat, substr(enrd_join_date,1,10) as enrd_join_date from enrollment_detail E LEFT JOIN member M ON e.mem_id = m.mem_id LEFT JOIN course C ON e.crs_id = c.crs_id LEFT JOIN syllabus S ON c.slb_id = s.slb_id

select e.enrd_id as enrd_id, e.mem_id as mem_id, m.mem_phone as mem_phone, m.mem_name as mem_name, s.slb_type as slb_type, substr(enrd_complete_date,1,4)||'년 '||substr(enrd_complete_date,6,2)||'월 '||substr(enrd_complete_date,9,2)||'일' as enrd_complete_date, m.mem_email as mem_email, m.mem_company_name as mem_company_name, s.slb_name as slb_name, e.enrd_stat as enrd_stat, enrd_join_date as enrd_join_date, replace(substr(crs_start_date, 1, 10), '-', '.') as crs_start_date, replace(substr(crs_end_date, 1, 10), '-', '.') as crs_end_date from enrollment_detail E LEFT JOIN member M ON e.mem_id = m.mem_id LEFT JOIN course C ON e.crs_id = c.crs_id LEFT JOIN syllabus S ON c.slb_id = s.slb_id where e.enrd_id=#{id}

select * from member
WHERE mem_name LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
WHERE mem_company_name LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY mem_join_date) NUM,
from member ORDER BY mem_join_date) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{page} AND 10

WHERE mem_name LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
